item.title: 3. Bergkessel Region
item.description: Hexes Obvious features are discovered when entering a hex. Hidden features are discovered in a 1:6 chance when entering a hex. If a party spends 1 day searching a hex, they have a 3:6 chance of finding hidden features.

item.title: 2. Introduction
item.description: Adventure Overview Notes for using OSE Use the regular Advanced OSE system. Allow black powder weapons from Carcass Crawler. Setting Notes Pseudo-European, set in the 16th century.
